English: You don't have your own room.
Miia doesn't have a red pen.

Finnish: Voi meitä, kun meillä ei ole teitä.
English: Poor us, we don't have you (plural).
Hungarian: Szánjunk minket, amikor nincs ti bennünk.

English: In the apartment there is a window.
In the book there are over 300 pages.
Hungarian: A könyvben több mint 300 oldal van.

English: In the car there are four wheels.
In the table there are four legs.
